Key: Oh! It's already started! Our class is up for the scrimmage!

Hey look, Itsuka! Ahhh! Their shorts are so great!
Shorts like that are a healthy male's romance!
Rather, it's their muse! No! It's the ultimate gift!

Don't you ever think about anything else?
It's always the same thing with you.

But I mean, look! Look at Tobiichi's shorts!
Not even the ultimate master can copy that...
That is crazy!
What are you comparing her with?

Now now! Let's cheer her on! GOOOOO!
Go fight win! SHORTS!!
Go fight win! SHORTS!!

You know... You're playing hooky.
The least you can do is cheer them on...

Don't be such a stiff, Itsuka. My cheering will get
them so pumped! Alright! GO GO GO!

(H-He's so far gone. Seriously.
I'm going to pretend I don't know him... Yeah...)

Huh? Tobiichi, why isn't she on offense?
She keeps going to pick up the ball.
It's probably because she's a Libero.
Libero? Like in soccer?
You really don't know?
Of course! I only look at bloomers during volleyball.

That's not something to be proud of! There is
a position called Libero in volleyball. This role
is an expert in defense and they don't attack.

Hm. What a lame role. Well, as long as I can
admire their shorts, I don't care what it is!
Let's go, shorts! Fight, shorts!
(*sigh*... Can someone get him away from me?)
Yo, Tonomachi! You're really into this, man!

Yeah! Of course! Erotic things are the source of my
power!

I see. That's nice. Someone on the soccer team
got injured, so I'm looking for a replacement.
What?
Can I take him, Itsuka?

Yeah, go ahead. Do what you want with him.
I'd actually appreciate you taking him off of
my hands.

H-Hey! Itsuka! Why are you betraying me?!
I trusted you!
Well, you probably shouldn't have.
T-That is so evil! You're so messed up, Itsuka!
Later, Itsuka. Come check out the soccer match later.
Definitely! Take care of Tonomachi for me!

Whoa! H-Hey, wait! I want to see more of those
shorts! I just waaant to seee mooore! Don't take
my youth away from meeeeee!
Phew. Finally, I can focus on the... hm?

Whoa! Amazing, Origami! You usually would've
given up when the ball got that close. She's
really hanging on there.
*grunt*!

W-Wow, her physical abilities are amazing! Is she
anticipating the moves? She's always in the right place
at the right time. She's so good at this!
HM!

(The other team has some really good volleyball
players! They're really laying it down with these serves.)
(That ball just flew past the net!)

(It's not spinning and it's hard to tell which direction
it'll go. No one can tell!)
(What?!)

(The ball didn't fall anywhere. It passed the net
and is headed for the back line!)

(Damn. That's the hardest area to aim at. Origami,
the god of guarding for our class, was trying to
cover for her teammate who wasn't good at serves...)
(There's no way. It's out!)
*grunt*!
(What?! It went... up?!)
(Everyone is screaming...)
(Did she make it in time from all the way over there?)

(Right before the ball hit the floor, Origami
slid in and her fingers tipped the ball up!)
T-That's incredible...

(The opponent attacked right as that happened.
The player on the other team dipped down, someone
came running to spike it...)

(She blocked it again?! Origami... your speed
is absolutely unreal...)

(I feel like she's as quick as a bolt of lightning.
AST members really are that amazing...)
15 vs 13! Game set, 2-2 wins!
(Aw... they lost...)

(Despite all of her effort, the attacker closed out
the rally with a crazy smash. They were so close.
That was kind of a let down...)

(You guys? Oh... yeah, huh...
both teams tried their best. What a great game!)

(The whole gym was clapping, and I clapped with all
my might alongside them.)

(I clapped for our 2-4 volley ball team...
and for the guard god, Origami Tobiichi!)
